participant_1.background:
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.
I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
we are getting married in a park.
I am grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.
i like football.

participant_2.background:
I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic.
i like to draw other people.
i married miss usa.
it takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning.
both my parents were teachers.

content.text: Thanks! I love bright colors and patterns. They make me feel more confident and energetic.
That's great! I feel the same way. It's so important to wear something that makes you feel good.
Yeah, I agree. I'm glad you feel the same way.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an artist. I draw other people.
Oh, that's awesome! I love art. What kind of things do you draw?
I mostly draw portraits, but I also like to draw landscapes and still lifes.
That's really cool. I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure, I'd love to show you.
Great! How about we meet up this weekend? I'm free on Saturday.
Sounds good. I'm free on Saturday too.
Great! I'll text you my number
